channel.title: MMoPoker
channel.description:
[b]Hello Moparscape Users :D[/b]
[b]Intro :[/b] Today I will be telling you About MMoPoker. MMoPoker is an online game which is basically Poker but instead of normal Poker You can deposit Rs07gp , eocgp and bitcoins. When you are playing a game Of poker on mmopoker it also helps you on the side to tell you what do you have e.g flush , pair , high card and more.
[b]General Information :[/b] You can play different type of poker games for example we have , (If you are new to poker you wouldn't know what these are) No limit and limit Texas Hold'em Pot limit and limit Omaha Pot limit and limit Omaha Hi/Lo So this website allows you to play any version of Poker You would like.
[b]Deposit And Withdrawals :[/b] Price to Buy 1000 Poker Chips from Staff:
Bitcoins: 0.1 BTC Runescape EOC: 50m Runescape 07: 4m
Price to Sell 1000 Poker Chips to Staff:
Bitcoins: 0.1 BTC Runescape EOC: 48m Runescape 07: 3.8m
[b]Contacts :[/b] Owner's : Skype : Rsgp.Poker Skype : Win4fun44
[b]Deposits and Withdrawal's :[/b] http://www.mmopoker.net/exchange [b]Home Page : [/b]http://www.mmopoker.net [b]Forums :[/b] http://www.mmopoker.net/forum [b]Play Now : [/b]http://www.mmopoker.net/poker [b]Information :[/b] http://www.mmopoker.net/faq [b]Giveaway : [/b]http://mmopoker.net/forum/m/13830269/viewthread/7441382-giveaway-sponsored-by-3lv3nz/page/1 [b]FreeRolls(You get free money ) : [/b]http://www.mmopoker.net [b]Refer me :[/b] http://www.mmopoker.net/forum/m/13830269/viewthread/7453373-my-refferals/post/last#last

item.title: MMoPoker
item.dc:creator: @3lv3nz 3lv3nz
item.description:
@3lv3nz wrote:

Hello Moparscape Users

Intro :
Today I will be telling you About MMoPoker.
MMoPoker is an online game which is basically Poker but instead of normal Poker You can deposit Rs07gp , eocgp and bitcoins. When you are playing a game Of poker on mmopoker it also helps you on the side to tell you what do you have e.g flush , pair , high card and more.

General Information :
You can play different type of poker games for example we have , (If you are new to poker you wouldn’t know what these are)
No limit and limit Texas Hold’em
Pot limit and limit Omaha
Pot limit and limit Omaha Hi/Lo
So this website allows you to play any version of Poker You would like.
